兵.definition: soldiers; a force; an army; weapons; arms; military; warlike; CL:個|个[ge4]

兵不厭詐.definition: there can never be too much deception in war; in war nothing is too deceitful; all's fair in war

兵不血刃.definition: lit. no blood on the men's swords (idiom); fig. an effortless victory

兵亂.definition: confusion of war; turmoil of war

兵來將擋，水來土掩.pinyin: bīng lái jiāng dǎng ， shuǐ lái tǔ yǎn
兵來將擋，水來土掩.definition: counter soldiers with arms, water with an earth weir (idiom); different situations call for different action; to adopt measures appropriate to the actual situation

兵來將敵，水來土堰.pinyin: bīng lái jiāng dí ， shuǐ lái tǔ yàn
兵來將敵，水來土堰.definition: counter soldiers with arms, water with an earth weir (idiom); different situations call for different action; to adopt measures appropriate to the actual situation

兵團.definition: large military unit; formation; corps; army

兵家.definition: military strategist in ancient China; military commander; soldier

兵差.definition: labor conscripted to support the military

兵庫.definition: Hyōgo prefecture in the midwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

兵庫縣.definition: Hyōgo prefecture in the midwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

兵強馬壯.definition: lit. strong soldiers and sturdy horses (idiom); fig. a well-trained and powerful army

兵戈擾攘.definition: arms and confusion (idiom); turmoil of war

兵敗如山倒.definition: troops in defeat like a landslide (idiom); a beaten army in total collapse

兵書.definition: a book on the art of war

兵棋推演.definition: war-gaming; simulation of a military operation

兵法.definition: art of war; military strategy and tactics

兵源.definition: manpower resources (for military service); sources of troops

兵痞.definition: army riffraff; army ruffian; soldier of fortune

兵精糧足.definition: elite soldiers, ample provisions (idiom); well-prepared forces; preparations for war are in an advanced state

兵臨城下.definition: soldiers at the city walls (idiom); fig. at a critical juncture

兵荒馬亂.definition: soldiers munity and troops rebel (idiom); turmoil and chaos of war

兵變.definition: mutiny; (Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army

兵貴神速.definition: lit. speed is a crucial asset in war (idiom); fig. swift and resolute (in doing sth)

兵連禍結.definition: ravaged by successive wars; war-torn; war-ridden

兵馬俑.definition: figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead; Terracotta Army (historic site)

兵馬未動，糧草先行.pinyin: bīng mǎ wèi dòng ， liáng cǎo xiān xíng
兵馬未動，糧草先行.definition: before the troops move, fodder and provisions go first (idiom); logistics comes before military maneuvers; an army marches on its stomach
